column4: where can I find a copy of GPL license ? I know that its somewhere in my ubuntu filesystem, dont remember where
I believe its version 2 and version 3
do you remember the path. Im sure that its somewhere around /usr/share
not sure, there are copies online though
yeah, but I would like to find it locally anyway :)
most web browsers already do this
thats not the point. I need a tool able to schedule download task, provide a view of download progress etc.
and it should download to my server, not the client which I use to connect
i see what you mean, let me hunt
yeah, I considered it, but you know ... its Java :(
I'll take it if there is nothing else better
